desc: A video recording of a football match between Manchester United and Arsenal.

sttData.content: The match commenced with a ceremonial kick-off by the team captains.
Manchester United took the lead after a brilliant goal by Ronaldo in the 23rd minute.
sttData.speaker: Commentator

sttData.content: Arsenal equalized through a penalty kick converted by Aubameyang in the 35th minute.
sttData.speaker: Commentator

sttData.content: The second half started with both teams creating chances but failing to score. Manchester United made several substitutions to freshen up their attack.
In the final minutes of the game, Manchester United scored a decisive goal to secure a 2-1 victory.
sttData.speaker: Commentator

stt.sttSummary: The video features a football match between Manchester United and Arsenal, with Manchester United winning 2-1 through two goals by Ronaldo and a decisive goal in the second half. The commentator provides analysis and updates throughout the game.
